imdb.plot outline: Set in the musical world of a famous restaurant and anchored around the storyline of a rich young girl's journey of self-discovery when she starts working in the kitchen of the restaurant, straight out of Le Cordon Bleu, Paris. She goes to work at her father's restaurant, The Avilon, and learns that she cannot always get her way by being Daddy's girl.
imdb.title: Bep Hat: The Kitchen Musical
plot: Set in the musical world of a famous restaurant and anchored around the storyline of a rich young girl's journey of self-discovery when she starts working in the kitchen of the restaurant, straight out of Le Cordon Bleu, Paris. She goes to work at her father's restaurant, The Avilon, and learns that she cannot always get her way by being Daddy's girl.
